name: 1to1 Help
description: 1to1help.net has devoted itself solely to providing employee and employer well-being through EAP and POSH services.  The company focuses towards the cause of employee emotional and physical wellness; delivering quality and maintaining integrity has been the cornerstone for the organisation. 1to1help.net supports organizations improve employee well-being, through a variety of programmes. They are a global support Partner of 750+ companies covering ~4.5 million people including dependents.
features: Prevention of Sexual Harassment of Women (POSH) Support Services
Headline: Making Happy Employees the Norm
ShortDescription: 1to1help is India’s leading Employee Assistance Program (EAP) service provider with a reputation for quality with integrity

Highlights.name: India's Leading Employee Assistance Program
Highlights.description: 1to1Help is India's leading Employee Assistance Program (EAP).They offer a variety of evidence-based interventions to enhance employee well-being and productivity.

Highlights.name: Services Offered
Highlights.description: 1to1Help offers a variety of services to improve employee mental health.These services include Employee Assistance Programs (EAPs), Student Assistance Programs (SAPs), and 1to1Maternity.

Highlights.name: Success Stories
Highlights.description: 1to1Help has many success stories from employees who have used their services.Employees have reported that 1to1Help has helped them with stress, sadness, anger, anxiety, and relationship issues.Employees have reported that 1to1Help has helped them with stress, sadness, anger, anxiety, and relationship issues.

enhanced_description: 1to1help.net is a global support partner specializing in employee and employer well-being, with a strong focus on emotional and physical wellness. As India's leading Employee Assistance Program (EAP) provider, they offer a variety of evidence-based interventions, including core EAP services, Prevention of Sexual Harassment (POSH) support, Shift Work Lifestyle Management, Healthy Maternity Programs (including 1to1Maternity), Gender Diversity Programs, and Student Assistance Programs (SAPs). Their comprehensive services aim to improve employee mental health, overall well-being, and productivity, ultimately supporting organizations in improving employee happiness and engagement. They serve as a global support partner for over 750 companies, covering approximately 4.5 million people including dependents, and have been operating since 2001.
key_use_cases: Providing confidential support for employee mental and emotional well-being (EAP)
Addressing and preventing workplace sexual harassment (POSH)
Supporting employees with lifestyle challenges related to shift work
Promoting health and well-being during maternity
Fostering an inclusive workplace through gender diversity initiatives
Managing employee stress, anxiety, sadness, anger, and relationship issues
Improving overall employee happiness and engagement
competitive_advantages: Leading Employee Assistance Program (EAP) provider in India
Extensive experience and global reach, supporting 750+ companies and approximately 4.5 million people including dependents
Long-standing presence in the market (launched in 2001)
Offers a diverse range of evidence-based interventions for well-being
Comprehensive service offering beyond EAP, including POSH, Shift Work, Maternity, Gender Diversity, and Student Assistance Programs
roi_benefits: Reduced employee stress, anxiety, sadness, and anger
Better management of employee relationship issues
Support for compliance with workplace harassment regulations (POSH)
searchable_keywords: Prevention of Sexual Harassment of Women
compliance_features: Support for Prevention of Sexual Harassment of Women (POSH) compliance
scalability_features: Capable of supporting large and global enterprises
Supports large employee populations (e.g., 4.5 million people and their dependents)
